text: Julianne Phillips (born May 6, 1960Dave Marsh, Glory Days: Bruce Springsteen in the 1980s, Pantheon Books, 1987; . pp. 303, 316-18.) is an American model and actress. She is known for being the first wife of Bruce Springsteen. She is also known for her role as Francesca "Frankie" Reed on the television drama series Sisters (1991â€“96). ==References== ==Other websites== * *Julianne Phillips profile, NNDb.com; accessed October 29, 2014.
